pact-beast-claw.name: Pact Beast Claw
pact-beast-claw.description: Channel your bound connection through your hand, which temporarily transforms into a twisted claw of shadow and bone. The pact beast's essence surges through you. On hit, you recover 1D6 HP from stolen life force.

lesser-pact.name: Lesser Pact

attacks.name: Shadow Bite
attacks.special: On hit, target makes GRT check (Diff 25) or loses 5 ST

summon.duration: until destroyed, dismissed, or long rest

lesser-pact.description: Reach into the damned realms and pull forth a lesser creature willing to serve. The beast emerges snarling, bound by chains of dark energy only you can see.

blood-debt.name: Blood Debt

special: Caster loses 15 HP to empower target Pact Beast

blood-debt.description: Sacrifice your own vitality to empower a bound creature. Your blood becomes fuel, and your servant grows stronger for it. Target Pact Beast gains +1 D20 on all rolls and +1D8 to damage.

minor-pact.name: Minor Pact

attacks.name: Rending Claws
attacks.special: On hit, target gains Bleeding (1 stack). May attack twice per turn at -1 D20 each.

summon.duration: until destroyed, dismissed, or long rest

minor-pact.description: Forge a stronger connection to the damned realms, summoning a beast of greater power. These creatures retain fragments of their former intelligence.

drain-pact-beast.name: Drain Pact Beast

special: Dismiss your active Pact Beast
Recover HP equal to half its remaining HP
Restore 1D4 DF

drain-pact-beast.description: Dissolve your summoned servant, consuming its remaining essence to restore yourself. The beast's final screams echo only in your mind.

beasts-burden.name: Beast's Burden

special: Redirect up to 20 points of damage to your active Pact Beast

beasts-burden.description: Transfer damage meant for you onto your bound servant. The pact works both waysâ€”your pain becomes its suffering.

pact-beast-rotting-strike.name: Pact Beast Rotting Strike

special: Command your Pact Beast to attack
Beast's next attack deals +3D8 damage
On hit, inflicts 'Rotting' condition (2D6 damage per turn until treated)
Costs the beast 10 HP

pact-beast-rotting-strike.description: Command your bound beast to deliver a devastating attack infused with the corruption of the damned realms. The wound festers with unnatural decay.

dual-pact-mastery.name: Dual Pact Mastery

grants: May have two Pact Beasts active simultaneously

dual-pact-mastery.description: Your binding skills have grown sufficient to maintain two servants simultaneously. The strain is immense, but the tactical advantage is undeniable. While two are active, you suffer -1 to all stat modifiers.

greater-pact.name: Greater Pact

attacks.name: Fearsome Roar
attacks.special: All enemies within 20 ft. make COR check (Diff 40) or gain Terrified

summon.duration: until destroyed, dismissed, or long rest

greater-pact.description: Reach deep into the damned realms and forge a bond with a truly powerful entity. Greater Pact Beasts are terrifying combatants with fragments of demonic intelligence.

whisper-of-vice.name: Whisper of Vice

special: If target fails a DET check during duration, caster learns one secret desire or fear

whisper-of-vice.description: Plant a seed of temptation in a target's mind. They become acutely aware of their darkest desires, making resistance to suggestion increasingly difficult.

tainted-touch.name: Tainted Touch
tainted-touch.description: Your hand channels the essence of corruption. Flesh you contact begins to darken and wither, marked by the damned. Target gains 'Marked by Corruption': -1 to all stat modifiers for 3 rounds.

soul-glimpse.name: Soul Glimpse

special: Learn one of target's fears, weaknesses, or guilty secrets (GM's discretion)
Your next ability against them gains +1 D20
Target may sense the intrusion (FRS check Diff 30)

soul-glimpse.description: Peer into a target's soul and witness the darkness lurking within. The knowledge grants you power over them.

corrupt-will.name: Corrupt Will

special: Target makes DET check (Diff 35) or takes one action of your choice on their next turn
Cannot directly self-harm

corrupt-will.description: Override a target's better judgment, forcing them to act against their nature. The effect is brief but can turn the tide of battle.

profane-aura.name: Profane Aura

special: Enemies with 'good' alignments or who serve protective deities suffer -2 D20

profane-aura.description: Emanate an aura of corruption that saps the strength of the righteous. Those who fight for noble causes find their conviction wavering.

festering-doubt.name: Festering Doubt

special: Cannot use abilities requiring concentration

festering-doubt.description: Infect a target's mind with paralyzing uncertainty. Every decision becomes agony, every action questionable. Target gains 'Doubt' condition: -2 AP per turn.

mass-corruption.name: Mass Corruption

special: All enemies in area make DET check (Diff 40)
Success: Half effect for 1 round

mass-corruption.description: Release a wave of corrupting energy that touches all nearby enemies. Their virtues become vices, their strengths become weaknesses.

thralls-embrace.name: Thrall's Embrace

special: Target must be below 25% HP
Thralls follow commands and use their abilities on caster's behalf

thralls-embrace.description: Temporarily bind a weakened enemy to your will. They fight for you until the corruption fades or they are freed by their allies.

absolute-corruption.name: Absolute Corruption

special: Target makes DET check (Diff 50)
Failure: Target becomes permanent thrall until magically cleansed
Requires Focus of Healing Level 4 or equivalent to remove
Success: Take Sanity damage and 'Corrupted Soul' condition

absolute-corruption.description: Channel the full power of the damned realms through a single target, utterly overwhelming their will and transforming them into an avatar of corruption.

minor-summon.name: Minor Summon

creature.name: Minor Damned Spirit
passives: Incorporeal: Physical attacks deal half damage

special: Maximum 3 active at once

minor-summon.description: Tear a small hole in reality and pull forth a spirit of minor malevolence. These wispy entities are weak individually but can harass enemies and serve as scouts.

infernal-bolt.name: Infernal Bolt
infernal-bolt.description: Hurl a bolt of condensed damned energy. The projectile screams as it flies, trailing dark flames that burn with cold malice.
infernal-bolt.notes: Infernal damage: resistance to fire reduces by 25%, immunity to fire reduces by 50%

demonic-grasp.name: Demonic Grasp
demonic-grasp.description: Conjure a spectral hand from the damned realms that grips and burns your target. The hand holds them in place while infernal energies course through their body.

lesser-summon.name: Lesser Summon

creature.name: Lesser Damned Spirit

attacks.name: Wail
attacks.special: All enemies within 15 ft. make COR check (Diff 35) or gain Terrified

passives: Incorporeal: Physical attacks deal half damage

summon.duration: until destroyed, dismissed, or long rest

lesser-summon.description: Open a larger rift and call forth a more substantial spirit. Lesser Damned Spirits can engage in direct combat and possess limited intelligence.

siphon-spirit.name: Siphon Spirit

special: Heal one summoned creature within 30 ft. for the same amount as damage dealt

siphon-spirit.description: Drain the life essence from a damaged enemy, channeling it through yourself to restore a summoned spirit. Death feeds death.
